shellcommand_test.comment: Ensure 'kubectl get secrets --namespace kube-system' output Pattern Not Match '.+' (string)

Ensure 'for node in $(kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[*].metadata.name}'); do kubectl exec -it file-check -- stat -c %a /host/var/lib/kubelet/kubeconfig; done' output Pattern Match '644' (string)

Ensure 'for node in $(kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[*].metadata.name}'); do kubectl exec -it file-check -- stat -c %a /host/var/lib/kubelet/kubeconfig; done' output Pattern Match '640' (string)

Ensure 'for node in $(kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[*].metadata.name}'); do kubectl exec -it file-check -- stat -c %U:%G /host/var/lib/kubelet/kubeconfig; done' output Pattern Match 'root:root' (string)

Ensure 'for node in $(kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[*].metadata.name}'); do kubectl exec -it file-check -- stat -c %a /host/etc/kubernetes/kubelet-config.yaml; done' output Pattern Match '644' (string)

Ensure 'for node in $(kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[*].metadata.name}'); do kubectl exec -it file-check -- stat -c %a /host/etc/kubernetes/kubelet-config.yaml; done' output Pattern Match '640' (string)

Ensure 'for node in $(kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[*].metadata.name}'); do kubectl exec -it file-check -- stat -c %U:%G /host/etc/kubernetes/kubelet.yaml; done' output Pattern Match 'root:root' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get clusterrolebindings -o=wide' output Pattern Match 'cluster-admin' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl auth can-i get,list,watch secrets --all-namespaces --as=system:authenticated' output Pattern Match 'no' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get roles --all-namespaces -o yaml' output Pattern Match '"*"' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get clusterroles -o yaml' output Pattern Match '"*"' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get serviceaccounts/default -o yaml' output Pattern Match 'automountServiceAccountToken.*false' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get serviceaccounts/$SERVICE_ACCOUNT -o yaml' output Pattern Match 'automountServiceAccountToken.*false' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get pods/$POD -o yaml' output Pattern Match 'automountServiceAccountToken.*false' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get clusterrolebinding cluster-admin -o json' output Pattern Match 'system:masters' (string)

Ensure 'kubectl get clusterrolebindings -o json | jq -r '["Name"], ["-----"], (.items[] | select((.subjects | length) > 0) | select(any(.subjects[]; .name == "system:anonymous")) | [.metadata.namespace, .metadata.name]) | @tsv'' output Null Test '' ()

Ensure 'kubectl get rolebindings -A -o json \ | jq -r '["Namespace", "Name"], ["---------", "-----"], (.items[] | select((.subjects | length) > 0) | select(any(.subjects[]; .name == "system:anonymous")) | [.metadata.namespace, .metadata.name]) | @tsv''

Ensure 'kubectl get clusterrolebindings -o json | jq -r '["Name"], ["-----"], (.items[] | select((.subjects | length) > 0) | select(any(.subjects[]; .name == "system:unauthenticated")) | [.metadata.namespace, .metadata.name]) | @tsv'' output Pattern Mat

Ensure 'kubectl get rolebindings -A -o json \ | jq -r '["Namespace", "Name"], ["---------", "-----"], (.items[] | select((.subjects | length) > 0) | select(any(.subjects[]; .name == "system:unauthenticated")) | [.metadata.namespace, .metadata.name]) | @

Ensure 'kubectl get clusterrolebindings -o json | jq -r '["Name"], ["-----"], (.items[] | select((.subjects | length) > 0) | select(any(.subjects[]; .name == "system:unauthenticated")) | [.metadata.namespace, .metadata.name]) | @tsv'' output Pattern Mat

Ensure 'kubectl get clusterrolebindings -o json | jq -r '["Name"], ["-----"], (.items[] | select((.subjects | length) > 0) | select(any(.subjects[]; .name == "system:unauthenticated")) | [.metadata.namespace, .metadata.name]) | @tsv'' output Pattern Mat
Ensure 'kubectl get networkpolicy --all-namespaces' output Pattern Match '.+' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get all -o jsonpath='{range .items[?(@..secretKeyRef)]} {.kind} {.metadata.name} {"\n"}{end}' -A' output Pattern Match '.+' (string)

Ensure 'kubectl get pods --all-namespaces -o json | jq -r '.items[] | select(.metadata.annotations."seccomp.security.alpha.kubernetes.io/pod" == "runtime/default" or .spec.securityContext.seccompProfile.type == "RuntimeDefault") | {namespace: .metadata.na
Ensure 'kubectl get pods -n default' output Pattern Match '.+' (string)
Ensure 'gcloud services list --enabled' output Pattern Match 'Container Registry API' (string)
Ensure 'gcloud services list --enabled' output Pattern Match 'Container Analysis API' (string)
Ensure GKE clusters are not running using the Compute Engine default service account
Ensure Kubernetes Secrets are encrypted using keys managed in Cloud KMS
Ensure the GKE Metadata Server is Enabled
Ensure Container-Optimized OS (COS) is used for GKE node images
Ensure Node Auto-Repair is enabled for GKE nodes
Ensure Node Auto-Upgrade is enabled for GKE nodes
Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq .releaseChannel.channel' output Pattern Match 'REGULAR' (string)
Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq .releaseChannel.channel' output Pattern Match 'STABLE' (string)
Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $CLUSTER_ZONE --format json | jq '.shieldedNodes''' output Pattern Match 'enabled": true' (string)
Ensure Integrity Monitoring for Shielded GKE Nodes is Enabled
Ensure Secure Boot for Shielded GKE Nodes is Enabled
Enable VPC Flow Logs and Intranode Visibility
Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.ipAllocationPolicy.useIpAliases'' output Pattern Match 'true' (string)
Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.masterAuthorizedNetworksConfig'' output Pattern Match 'enabled.*true' (string)
Ensure clusters are created with Private Endpoint Enabled and Public Access Disabled
Ensure clusters are created with Private Nodes
Ensure 'kubectl get svc -A -o json | jq '.items[] | select(.spec.type=="LoadBalancer")'' output Null Test '' ()
Ensure Logging and Cloud Monitoring is Enabled
Ensure Logging and Cloud Monitoring is Enabled
Ensure authentication using Client Certificates is Disabled
Ensure Legacy Authorization (ABAC) is Disabled
Ensure 'gcloud container node-pools describe $NODE_POOL --cluster $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE' output Pattern Match 'diskType.*pd-balanced' (string)
Ensure 'gcloud container node-pools describe $NODE_POOL --cluster $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE' output Pattern Match 'diskType.*pd-standard' (string)
Ensure Kubernetes Web UI is Disabled
Ensure that Alpha clusters are not used for production workloads
Ensure 'gcloud container node-pools describe $NODE_POOL --cluster $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.config.sandboxConfig'' output Null Test '' ()
Ensure use of Binary Authorization

process58_test.comment: Ensure that the --read-only-port argument is set to 0

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_SYSTEM_PODS_ARGS.+--read-only-port=0.+$

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure 'kubectl get networkpolicy --all-namespaces' output Pattern Match '.+' (string)
shellcommand_object.command: kubectl get networkpolicy --all-namespaces

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure 'kubectl get all -o jsonpath='{range .items[?(@..secretKeyRef)]} {.kind} {.metadata.name} {"\n"}{end}' -A' output Pattern Match '.+' (string)
shellcommand_object.command: kubectl get all -o jsonpath='{range .items[?(@..secretKeyRef)]} {.kind} {.metadata.name} {"\n"}{end}' -A

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure 'kubectl get pods --all-namespaces -o json | jq -r '.items[] | select(.metadata.annotations."seccomp.security.alpha.kubernetes.io/pod" == "runtime/default" or .spec.securityContext.seccompProfile.type == "RuntimeDefault") | {namespace: .metadata.na
shellcommand_object.command: kubectl get pods --all-namespaces -o json | jq -r '.items[] | select(.metadata.annotations."seccomp.security.alpha.kubernetes.io/pod" == "runtime/default" or .spec.securityContext.seccompProfile.type == "RuntimeDefault") | {namespace: .metadata.namespace, name: .metadata.name, seccompProfile: .spec.securityContext.seccompProfile.type}'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure 'kubectl get pods -n default' output Pattern Match '.+' (string)
shellcommand_object.command: kubectl get pods -n default

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure 'gcloud services list --enabled' output Pattern Match 'Container Registry API' (string)
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud services list --enabled

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure 'gcloud services list --enabled' output Pattern Match 'Container Analysis API' (string)
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud services list --enabled

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure GKE clusters are not running using the Compute Engine default service account
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container node-pools describe $NODE_POOL --cluster $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.config.serviceAccount'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Kubernetes Secrets are encrypted using keys managed in Cloud KMS
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.databaseEncryption'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure the GKE Metadata Server is Enabled
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $CLUSTER_ZONE --format json | jq '.nodePools[].config.workloadMetadataConfig'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Container-Optimized OS (COS) is used for GKE node images
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container node-pools describe $NODE_POOL --cluster $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.config.imageType'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Node Auto-Repair is enabled for GKE nodes
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container node-pools describe $POOL_NAME --cluster $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.management'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Node Auto-Upgrade is enabled for GKE nodes
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container node-pools describe $POOL_NAME --cluster $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.management'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq .releaseChannel.channel' output Pattern Match 'REGULAR' (string)
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq .releaseChannel.channel

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq .releaseChannel.channel' output Pattern Match 'STABLE' (string)
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq .releaseChannel.channel

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $CLUSTER_ZONE --format json | jq '.shieldedNodes''' output Pattern Match 'enabled": true' (string)
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $CLUSTER_ZONE --format json | jq '.shieldedNodes'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Integrity Monitoring for Shielded GKE Nodes is Enabled
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container node-pools describe $POOL_NAME --cluster $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq .config.shieldedInstanceConfig

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Secure Boot for Shielded GKE Nodes is Enabled
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container node-pools describe $POOL_NAME --cluster $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq .config.shieldedInstanceConfig

shellcommand_object.comment: Enable VPC Flow Logs and Intranode Visibility
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.networkConfig.enableIntraNodeVisibility'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.ipAllocationPolicy.useIpAliases'' output Pattern Match 'true' (string)
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.ipAllocationPolicy.useIpAliases'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.masterAuthorizedNetworksConfig'' output Pattern Match 'enabled.*true' (string)
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.masterAuthorizedNetworksConfig'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure clusters are created with Private Endpoint Enabled and Public Access Disabled
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.privateClusterConfig.enablePrivateEndpoint'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure clusters are created with Private Nodes
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.privateClusterConfig.enablePrivateNodes'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure 'kubectl get svc -A -o json | jq '.items[] | select(.spec.type=="LoadBalancer")'' output Null Test '' ()
shellcommand_object.command: kubectl get svc -A -o json | jq '.items[] | select(.spec.type=="LoadBalancer")'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Logging and Cloud Monitoring is Enabled
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.loggingService'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Logging and Cloud Monitoring is Enabled
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.monitoringService'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure authentication using Client Certificates is Disabled
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.masterAuth.clientKey'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Legacy Authorization (ABAC) is Disabled
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.legacyAbac'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure 'gcloud container node-pools describe $NODE_POOL --cluster $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE' output Pattern Match 'diskType.*pd-balanced' (string)
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container node-pools describe $NODE_POOL --cluster $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure 'gcloud container node-pools describe $NODE_POOL --cluster $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE' output Pattern Match 'diskType.*pd-standard' (string)
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container node-pools describe $NODE_POOL --cluster $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure Kubernetes Web UI is Disabled
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.addonsConfig.kubernetesDashboard'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure that Alpha clusters are not used for production workloads
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.enableKubernetesAlpha'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure 'gcloud container node-pools describe $NODE_POOL --cluster $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.config.sandboxConfig'' output Null Test '' ()
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container node-pools describe $NODE_POOL --cluster $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.config.sandboxConfig'

shellcommand_object.comment: Ensure use of Binary Authorization
shellcommand_object.command: gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq .binaryAuthorization

process58_object.comment: Ensure that the --read-only-port argument is set to 0

textfilecontent54_object.comment: Ensure at least one file named /etc/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf exists and matches pattern ^.*KUBELET_SYSTEM_PODS_ARGS.+--read-only-port=0.+$

shellcommand_state.comment: Ensure 'kubectl get secrets --namespace kube-system' output Pattern Not Match '.+' (string)

Ensure 'for node in $(kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[*].metadata.name}'); do kubectl exec -it file-check -- stat -c %a /host/var/lib/kubelet/kubeconfig; done' output Pattern Match '644' (string)

Ensure 'for node in $(kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[*].metadata.name}'); do kubectl exec -it file-check -- stat -c %a /host/var/lib/kubelet/kubeconfig; done' output Pattern Match '640' (string)

Ensure 'for node in $(kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[*].metadata.name}'); do kubectl exec -it file-check -- stat -c %U:%G /host/var/lib/kubelet/kubeconfig; done' output Pattern Match 'root:root' (string)

Ensure 'for node in $(kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[*].metadata.name}'); do kubectl exec -it file-check -- stat -c %a /host/etc/kubernetes/kubelet-config.yaml; done' output Pattern Match '644' (string)

Ensure 'for node in $(kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[*].metadata.name}'); do kubectl exec -it file-check -- stat -c %a /host/etc/kubernetes/kubelet-config.yaml; done' output Pattern Match '640' (string)

Ensure 'for node in $(kubectl get nodes -o jsonpath='{.items[*].metadata.name}'); do kubectl exec -it file-check -- stat -c %U:%G /host/etc/kubernetes/kubelet.yaml; done' output Pattern Match 'root:root' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get clusterrolebindings -o=wide' output Pattern Match 'cluster-admin' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl auth can-i get,list,watch secrets --all-namespaces --as=system:authenticated' output Pattern Match 'no' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get roles --all-namespaces -o yaml' output Pattern Match '"*"' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get clusterroles -o yaml' output Pattern Match '"*"' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get serviceaccounts/default -o yaml' output Pattern Match 'automountServiceAccountToken.*false' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get serviceaccounts/$SERVICE_ACCOUNT -o yaml' output Pattern Match 'automountServiceAccountToken.*false' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get pods/$POD -o yaml' output Pattern Match 'automountServiceAccountToken.*false' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get clusterrolebinding cluster-admin -o json' output Pattern Match 'system:masters' (string)

Ensure 'kubectl get clusterrolebindings -o json | jq -r '["Name"], ["-----"], (.items[] | select((.subjects | length) > 0) | select(any(.subjects[]; .name == "system:unauthenticated")) | [.metadata.namespace, .metadata.name]) | @tsv'' output Pattern Mat

Ensure 'kubectl get clusterrolebindings -o json | jq -r '["Name"], ["-----"], (.items[] | select((.subjects | length) > 0) | select(any(.subjects[]; .name == "system:unauthenticated")) | [.metadata.namespace, .metadata.name]) | @tsv'' output Pattern Mat

Ensure 'kubectl get clusterrolebindings -o json | jq -r '["Name"], ["-----"], (.items[] | select((.subjects | length) > 0) | select(any(.subjects[]; .name == "system:unauthenticated")) | [.metadata.namespace, .metadata.name]) | @tsv'' output Pattern Mat
Ensure 'kubectl get networkpolicy --all-namespaces' output Pattern Match '.+' (string)
Ensure 'kubectl get all -o jsonpath='{range .items[?(@..secretKeyRef)]} {.kind} {.metadata.name} {"\n"}{end}' -A' output Pattern Match '.+' (string)

Ensure 'kubectl get pods --all-namespaces -o json | jq -r '.items[] | select(.metadata.annotations."seccomp.security.alpha.kubernetes.io/pod" == "runtime/default" or .spec.securityContext.seccompProfile.type == "RuntimeDefault") | {namespace: .metadata.na
Ensure 'kubectl get pods -n default' output Pattern Match '.+' (string)
Ensure 'gcloud services list --enabled' output Pattern Match 'Container Registry API' (string)
Ensure 'gcloud services list --enabled' output Pattern Match 'Container Analysis API' (string)

Ensure Kubernetes Secrets are encrypted using keys managed in Cloud KMS

Ensure Node Auto-Repair is enabled for GKE nodes
Ensure Node Auto-Upgrade is enabled for GKE nodes

Ensure 'gcloud container clusters describe $CLUSTER_NAME --zone $COMPUTE_ZONE --format json | jq '.masterAuthorizedNetworksConfig'' output Pattern Match 'enabled.*true' (string)

Ensure clusters are created with Private Nodes
